product_name: Big Agnes Fly Creek UL 1 Footprint
long_description: Use this coated nylon taffeta footprint underneath your Big Agnes Fly Creek UL1 tent to protect its floor from wear and abrasion. Sized slightly smaller than tent floor so that it prevents pooling of water under tent during wet weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment.
short_description: Use this coated nylon taffeta footprint underneath your Big Agnes Fly Creek UL1 tent to protect its floor from wear and abrasion.
